usage: Event progression tracking and recovery timelines

dataMapping.title: Current Events Impact Timeline
dataMapping.subtitle: Event progression, audience impact phases, and recovery tracking
dataMapping.totalDuration: Total event impact duration (e.g., '3 weeks', '45 days', 'Ongoing')
dataMapping.overallObjective: Primary response objective (e.g., 'Monitor and adapt to current event impact on audience behavior', 'Maintain engagement during crisis period')

phases.primaryLabel: Event phase name (e.g., 'Event Emergence', 'Peak Impact Period', 'Recovery Phase', 'Stabilization')
phases.description: Phase-specific audience and performance impact description
phases.expectedOutcome: Expected phase outcomes (e.g., 'Audience behavior shift analysis', 'Content strategy pivot', 'Return to baseline metrics')
phases.budget: Phase budget allocation (e.g., '$50K emergency response', 'Reallocated content budget')

milestones.milestoneLabel: Event milestone (e.g., 'Peak Event Impact', 'Audience Recovery Begins', 'Content Strategy Adjusted')
successCriteria: Success criteria (e.g., 'Engagement returns to 90% of baseline', 'News consumption stabilizes', 'Entertainment content recovers')

dependencies: Phase dependencies (e.g., 'Event stabilization', 'Audience sentiment analysis', 'Content approval process')

successMetrics: Event response success metrics (e.g., 'Maintain 80% of baseline engagement', 'Audience retention above 85%', 'Crisis communication effectiveness')
riskFactors: Event-related risks (e.g., 'Extended event duration', 'Audience fatigue', 'Competitive advantage loss', 'Revenue impact exceeding projections')
